name: City Blitz Pico-8
description:
City Blitz 

Another remake of an Amiga game I wrote, which was a remake of Blitz a Vic-20 game by Simon Taylor for Commodore UK.

This was the first Pico-8 project I started in 2016 but was not finished until January 2021.

How to Play

Press Z/Circle to drop bombs on the buildings in eight evil cities before you crash your plane into them.
